name: Florida gone WILD (DEMO)
description:
Welcome to Florida! If you look to your left, you can see crackheads with guns, if you look to your right, you can see dudes walking alligators as if they were dogs.

Do you think you're up to being able to guess what happens in florida and what doesn't? Guess if articles are real or fake and try to get a high score!

                                                                                                                                                                                          

HOW TO PLAY

You are given the title of a headline related to Florida man, your job is to guess if the article is real or fake, very simple.
You score points with each right guess, if you guess incorrectly, you lose. Try to get a high score!

                                                                                                                                                                                          

Game created by ECSP from the BlueScreenBoys
